name: TANKS BATTLE WAR
description:
Tanks Battle War is a game for up two players that once swept through arcade machines, will now available in our homes from PC. 

FROM 8 BITS TO 3D

Hoguera Games has carefully detailed the mechanics and behaviours of each element of the original game in 8 bits and has adapted them to 3D, giving it and original aspect and attractive appearance suitable for all audiences. 

BATTLE CITY REMAKE

The game is and offline shoot’em up where the player controls a tank on a scene full of enemy tanks, whose mission is eliminate and prevent to destroying their military base.

TWO MODES

Tanks Battle War is made up of two game modes: Classic Mode, where you can feel the essence of the original game, and Campaign Mode, where you can test your skills in an innovative way.
